summary.span: 将指定的 实例添加到 中指定的从零开始的索引处。

span.span: Adds the specified instance to the at the specified zero-based index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已在集合中的项目数等于集合的容量，容量将是插入新元素之前自动重新分配内部数组增加一倍。If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. 如果`index`参数等于，则`serviceDescription`参数添加到末尾。If the `index` parameter is equal to , the `serviceDescription` parameter is added to the end of the . 插入点之后的元素将下移以容纳新元素。The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ServiceDescriptionCollection_Insert_Item_CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionCollection_Insert_Item_CopyTo/CPP/sdcollection_insert_item_copyto.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionCollection_Insert_Item_CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionCollection_Insert_Item_CopyTo/CS/servicedescriptioncollection_insert_item_copyto.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionCollection_Insert_Item_CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionCollection_Insert_Item_CopyTo/VB/servicedescriptioncollection_insert_item_copyto.vb#1)]

span.span: The parameter is less than zero.
\- or -

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间是成比例。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 跟在移除的元素移以占据空出的位置。The elements that follow the removed move up to occupy the vacated spot. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionCollection_Contains_IndexOf_Remove#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionCollection_Contains_IndexOf_Remove/CS/servicedescriptioncollection_contains_indexof_remove.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionCollection_Contains_IndexOf_Remove#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionCollection_Contains_IndexOf_Remove/VB/servicedescriptioncollection_contains_indexof_remove.vb#3)]
